plugin.name: alphacolor
plugin.description: RGBA from/to AYUV colorspace conversion preserving the alpha channel

element.name: alphacolor
element.description: ARGB from/to AYUV colorspace conversion preserving the alpha channel
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>
